name: Manteiga de Alho e Ervas
description: Manteiga aromatizada com alho e ervas.
description_en: Butter flavored with garlic and herbs.
instructions: Colocar a manteiga à temperatura ambiente durante 1 hora para amolecer.
Separar as folhas do alecrim, do tomilho e picar finamente.
Picar o alho e juntar a manteiga.
Colocar luvas limpas e envolver com as mãos até todos os ingredientes estarem bem misturados.
instructions_en: Leave butter at room temperature for 1 hour to soften.
Separate leaves from rosemary and thyme and chop finely.
Mince garlic and add to butter.
Put on clean gloves and mix with hands until all ingredients are well combined.
